question: India has signed agreements with which country for Visa Facilitation and Leather Technology?
explanation:
India has recently signed two agreements with Ethiopia, one on Visa Facilitation and the other on Leather Technology.
The agreements were signed in the presence of Ethiopia Deputy Prime Minister Demeke Mekonnen and Indiaâ€™s External Affairs Minister - S Jaishankar. The two countries have also committed to expanding their relationship in defence, economy, technology and cultural cooperation.
